messages.body: ooh this is kinda cool
real pretty
MP3 upload test.
this site lags a lot >_>
whenever someone sends a message
![ALTTEXT](/1CWkZv7fQAKxTVjZVrLZ8VHcrN6YGGcdky/data/users/1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh/vQDTzn8f850Qor81y46L7s9JX87rZXDmUp5O6T10jy0.gif)
Yeah, it's kinda clunky. But it's a beautiful kinda clunky.
20%? It's much more than that lol. Probably like 80% for me.
![ALTTEXT](/1CWkZv7fQAKxTVjZVrLZ8VHcrN6YGGcdky/data/users/1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh/gmv7YYqkSTmsEeaBns2FQewhSai87KkuJrOdgXspQ.png)
well maybe more like 60 or 70 lol
lol, yeah. It's all just spam and recruiters from like several years worth of email.
I used to be real good about keeping up on it but I've let it go and it's gotten impossible lol.
Btw I'm only using chrome since this site was lagging on firefox for some reason. On chrome it seems to be running fine.
Well I really like how I have firefox set up. Very sleek and nice. And it's not google lol.
lol. Do you have a mechanical one?
that's cool. what kind is it? Are you into them or just got one just because?
oh whoops. Sorry. Didn't see that message when I sent mine. Yeah I mostly just my mac laptop's keyboard. Though I *do* have a razer keyboard which is mechanical and pretty cool.
lol. You're pretty picky about keyboards then, huh?
lol. Meeses. I think it's just "Mice" as opposed to the singular "Mouse". And yeah, I get that.
blender game engine? I thought it was a 3d modeling software?
The "good job" message looks terrible on my laptop lol. It's 4 lines. "Good Job" on one, "emondae@zeroid.bit" on the second, a single exclamation mark on the third, and then the emoji for the fourth.

You can probably fetch them using the URL, kinda like what kaffiene does for other sites' indexes. But that'd require you to know which hub the user is in, and for the user to have those hubs downloaded. Not really ideal.
Oh, one thing you could do is make this site a merger site for zerome hubs, and then fetch user profiles as you normally would. That could work.
yeah, that'd be a clean way of going about it.

I actually don't know how the merger sites work in terms of code. I haven't messed with it. But I know you can make this site a 'front-end' for the hubs, and have it merge in the hubs into a DB, and then go ahead and fetch the appropriate profile pics as ZeroMe would.
I doubt browser notifications are possible in ZeroNet.
Why not just use an html5 audio tag?
Ah maybe not. I thought they did though.
I always see this site 'updated' so I think someone responded, but in reality it was just someone else visiting the site and getting logged in the 'last seen' thing. lol
znews@zeroid.bit yes, I'm really a girl.
yeah, it'd be neat to have a custom pic.
I like how many people have been using KaffieID
test
umm yeah. I just wanted to throw in my pic and just plop it in
what did I do wrong? haha
oh. I think I broke *all* the pics D:
Oh that's why it's not working. I'm so dumb.
hmm
yay!
my avatar doesn't seem to load on the recent messages until I scroll up and load my old ones. I wonder if this new one will have a pic?
:( I wonder why it only loads sometimes

I think I broke something haha. Glad others see it though. I also keep getting a popup "There are some new options available, do you want to update?" and I've clicked it a few times but it comes back every time I reload. I can't see anyones' pictures until I scroll up and reload messages. I dunno why.
I'mma try moving it to just regular files.

I stuck in a png called 'tsuruya.png'. I put that in the file_name field and stuck the type to "1". It only loaded for me once and I'm not sure why. I don't think it's a failing on my end since everyone elses' pics aren't loading either.
and now I tried switching it to the other method to link my zerome pic, but that's not working either
you can see my image successfully uploaded when looking through a proxy: https://bit.surf:43110/thunderwave.bit/data/users/1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh/tsuruya.png
![Tsuruya Pic](/1CWkZv7fQAKxTVjZVrLZ8VHcrN6YGGcdky/data/users/1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh/tsuruya.png)
works fine there
nope. I don't upload through proxies
I just use to confirm the upload
It's tsuruya from melancholy of haruhi suzumiya. And AFAIK she's an entirely normal human.
Ah, TTGL is real good. Well, the second half anyway.
you can see my pic? Could you post a screenshot please?
nice. I'll post what I see in a min
![Screencap](/1CWkZv7fQAKxTVjZVrLZ8VHcrN6YGGcdky/data/users/1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh/screenshot.png)
my file upload thing seems to have broken too
yeah I did a manual upload haha
night then :)
pics still aren't working for me :slight_frown:
Nope. I can't see your pic.
I can usually see the pictures people post, so you dun goofed.
rave@zeroid.bit make a news site or something like a decent reddit clone (we have zeronet central but it's not too great). News is like the main reason I'm still on the clearnet.
Yeah zeronet is still really small
Well it's still really new. Only 2 years old, and only 1 with actual functional websites. Word just really hasn't gotten around, and there's not really a killer app yet for it.
On zerohello click the three dots at the top of the site list, and then click "order sites by update time". The most recently updated sites will appear at the top
that's what I do to make sure I can be active wherever things are happening lol
I don't really like KDE or Gnome from what I've tried. XFCE seems nice though.
Anyone on right now?
Just rolled out an update for kaffiene and I wanna see what people think

Haha it's because everyone wants to see what the latest is, whether it's someone actually saying something or just someone else poking their head in

oh, for the pic thing, apparently you have to click the little 'update' button every time, and then scroll up to refresh

pops up every time I open it
how do I make sure of this?
I run zeronet with 'sudo python zeronet.py' and the folder is just in my downloads folder
given every other site works fine I simply assumed it was an issue with the site, rather than with my zeronet setup.
rythyrix@zeroid.bit I fixed my permissions and rebooted zeronet under my regular user instead of sudo/root and still get the same issue.
I'm here
got distracted for a min
wait really? AFAIK the proxy should have all of the required files downloaded, since they auto-download. I know the optional files it doesn't have though
but I have all of the optional files, so nbd
As for sirenyc... I honestly don't know what happened. Or why they'd kill the site

all the optional files, all of the files from the backup posted on zerotalk
I do have a copy of the content.json from the site I cloned from
I have all the optional files as I mentioned, I just need the main index page
which is what that old proxy has, but I haven't scraped
is there a need for the old content.json though?
As I said, all I did was download the earlier file that someone posted, and then combined that with the optional files that are still up
so any luck?
Have you tried using phantomjs?
look at kaffiene's grab.py
https://github.com/April93/Kaffiene/blob/master/grab.py
haha I'm just lazy is all
either way, I've started to rip it so hopefully I'll be able to get it mirrored soon
grabbed all the images. Now I'm grabbing all of the html files.
Alright, updated version should be up: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HwH4hfRhohJGVtZMBYprYKyHcuJNwL4sZ
uv@zeroid.bit what's up?
oh, my avatar starts working once I send something
avatar feature is so broken lol
I try to check in every now and again at least.
I like to check up on where the zeronet activity is
mostly I hang out on discord, and have my own server there, which you can find [here.](https://discord.gg/4kY4yAD)
redstoneb@zeroid.bit your link is broken lol. To do a link you just do regular markup. \[some text here\](urlhere)
your link has an exclamation point (!) in front of it, meaning it will try and display it like a picture. However, it's just a link to here. So the result is a bugged link that loads forever.
which one are you going to clone? You're free to go ahead and clone whichever. I've enabled cloning on all the ones that 'make sense' (kaffiene, kaffieid, zerotv mirror, etc)
cloning is a feature of zeronet, so feel free to make use of it
just don't try to pretend to be me or anything lol
you could clone my blog and kaffiene, and then make no changes and post pretending to be me.
but yeah, for userIDs you can't make a kaffie@zeroid account (names are unique). But you *could* create a kaffie@kaffie.bit
but no amount of that will let you post under my auth_address
profile pics don't really work that well for me
I just uploaded one and adjusted my data.json or w/e
it'd be in your zeronet data folder. zeronet/data/[siteaddress]/data/users/[your authaddress]/data.json
as for where your zeronet data is stored... I dunno. I have mine all extracted in my downloads folder lol

redstoneb@zeroid.bit I'm glad you figured it out. As for why this site isn't on kaffiene, it's simply because I haven't updated the index in months. I need to work on the autotagger first. Or someone can graciously tag all the untagged sites by hand ;)
This place is dead af lol
tsk tsk anonymouslogin@zeroid.bit. At least try to keep it a bit discrete.
It might be.
Loading old messages seems broken (it gets stuck at the top and doesn't load anything), but everything else seems to work fine.
nvm, still duplicate sent messages
Hey, scrolling is fixed!
still some duplicated messages though. but nothing too bad
Tried to rice my mac. Want to get a more platform agnostic workflow going on to ease my transition to linux.

seems thunderwave is still kinda buggy ><
Follow some english speaking people. It's not very active, but there's interesting stuff posted.
also be sure to watch ZeroTalk. That's where a lot of good english discussion happens.
Wow this has got a lot of improvements since the last time I used it
It's pretty legit. You're doing a lot of great work, keep it up! :grin:
how do you create new groups?
You can always just manually delete your comments by editing your data file lol

yeah that's probably the issue
only need to call it once

are you the same person who worked on the original KopyKate? Changed names?
lol. This chat is so slow moving.
Naive clueless sheltered white girl here. Does that actually work?
lol. I think that's just because no one is on at the same time, and publishing each message is fairly slow
yeah, they're horrifying
I always wonder that, miskv@zeroid.bit. How many people here are real humans, and how many are zombies?
Zombies don't experience qualia or subjective experience lol.
there's not much activity on ZN Dx. It's hard to stay here 24/7 when nothing is happening lol
true. I'm trying to think of what's all needed. I really do think it's just content and news.
maybe a reddit clone. ZeroVoat isn't that great
zalex@zeroid.bit
I just looked it up on kaffiene
I'd imagine either a page per chapter or a page per verse?
lol
zerotube hasn't worked for me for a long time now. Kinda sad since i liked it
I like how this site still has a broken header image when visiting the url directly instead of with a prefix
Does 08chan use optional image files and click-to-view? If not I ain't gonna touch it lol
Try refreshing the page lol. Thunderwave ain't the best chat, but it has the best features lmao.
we really need a chat that functions properly lol
Despite me disliking the ideology behind discord, the app is the best I've used for chatting. Too bad there isn't a FOSS alternative to it. IRC and matrix both suck so bad.

live chat is very useful, especially group chats. discord makes this easy and efficient. matrix and irc tend to have tons of problems in that regard. irc has an issue of consistency: chat logs are never saved, and you don't get new updates if you're offline. matrix has the issue of being slow on the official server, and unreliable on unofficial servers, given that it's federated. the ui is also awful.
hello
I find it hilarious how thunderwave continuously gets posts but no one ever manages to chat on here.
oh nice :)
I wonder how many people actually use zeronet on a day to day basis lol. I can't imagine it's that many
like there's probably dozens of us
I know 0chan was fairly active back when it first was a thing. Idk how it is now since i don't really go on there due to images being uploaded (and I'd rather not risk cp on my machine).
Reading over that 4chan thread it doesn't sound like they find zeronet very appealing...
yeah probably not the best chat app lol. but yeah, I feel like zeronet is kinda a tough sell.
nofish has been MIA for a while now. so.... no idea.

Losing his users.json file would just make him lose access to the nofish account. Not just go MIA on github and such. He could easily explain what's up if that were the case. And yeah, he could easily just hire some people.

Probably because keeping it updated with new things is a lot of work, and not everyone would be willing to switch to a new fork right away. I think a lot of people also don't really understand how zeronet's internals work. So there's very few people who'd be able to continue it.

I feel like recently there's been a small uptick in activity though... The ZN software is pretty sound. Just needs to have users. I think with enough interest, *someone* will eventually fork it when needed. IIRC there's already been a couple of attempts at a fork.
